snippet.title: How to Play Galaxy a tutorial with Sam Pardee
snippet.description:
Learn how to play Once Upon A Galaxy, the new card battle made for mobile, tablet and PC.

Sam Pardee shows us in this new player tutorial how to play Galaxy, the game mechanics and some tips on how to get started.

Choose a Captain to start the game. Your captain gives you a special bonus for your entire run.

Recruit characters in the shop to build up your crew.

Battle with opponents and the last crew standing wins.

Characters can be upgraded from bronze, to silver, to gold. Getting a silver character gives you a free shop. Upgrading to a gold character gives you a treasure.

Treasures are powerful tools that give you cool bonuses.

Spells are also in the shop and have one time power ups for your crew.

Learn more at www.galaxygame.gg

Sign up for the beta now.

Kickstarter campaign coming soon.
